'Today' is the fourth album by electronic music producer Junkie XL (Tom
Holkenborg). It was released in 2006 and features vocals by Nathan Mader and
acoustic guitar by Holkenborg on several tracks.

Honey is dedicated to and named after the mother of Holkenborg's former fiance.
